name: vermonter
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone from the US state of Vermont: The Vermonter is best known for his fierce opposition to the war. Logging, the state's second largest industry, keeps many Vermonters employed.
More examplesFewer examplesA Vermonter has been honored as Teacher of the Year.A majority of Vermonters who divorce do so without hiring an attorney.We'd heard that Vermonters take a while to get to know you.
